name: Cascading Style Simulator
description:
This game was made for: "Mini Jam 104".

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-104-cascade

This game was made in 3 days.

Cascade Style Simulator is a short puzzle game combining themes of CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) and puzzles.

The "Cascade" theme is the CSS.

The "Finite Quantity" limitation is the options you have to solve the puzzle, or the properties.

SOFTWARE USED:

- Godot

- Aesprite/Paint

- Sfxr

#minijam
